forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
The air in Downtown San Francisco invites a gentle warmth this afternoon, painting the cityscape in hues of golden sunlight, while a refreshing breeze waltzes through the streets at a modest pace. With temperatures hovering around a comfortable 66 degrees, the day feels as if nature itself has crafted an ideal moment for a leisurely stroll. The charm of the day lies not only in its sunlit embrace but also in the calmness that accompanies it, encouraging passersby to linger at outdoor cafés or perhaps explore the nearby parks. 

As twilight approaches, a soft veil of partly cloudy skies will blanket the horizon, ushering in a drop in temperature to a cozy 57 degrees. This inviting stretch of evening is perfect for wrapping oneself in a light sweater or jacket, as the gentle winds will continue to whisper through the city. A hint of fog may linger over the bay, wisps of the marine layer that manifest in delicately shifting clouds. This adds a touch of mystery to the night, suggesting the allure of long, quiet conversations under the stars. Whether one chooses to savor a stroll through a bustling market or find a quiet corner to read, the atmospheric conditions today paint a pleasing backdrop for the ordinary joys of life.
